page.title: 20Spectrum Arena
page.content: Spectrum is a leisure,sports and community complex which opened in 1981.The main arena is a sports hall desinged to convert into a l700 seat auditorium which can be used for spectator sports as well as concerts. T.V.Snooker and programmes like Crackerjack are filmed here.Every year there is a Circus and pop groups like Bucks Fizz hold concerts here.The complex also incorporates a pub and reataurant,a health and fitness suite, a sauna,4 suash courts,an activity hall,betting shop,hairdressers,Seniors Centre,and a conference suite.Future plans include a cinema,discotheque and a swimmimg pool. _______________________ This information was collected by the pupils and teachers of Chatfield County Primary School,Birchwood near Warrington,Cheshire.
